alert.note: Alert for York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 10:44PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern York County through 1100 PM CDT... At 1044 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Waco, or 10 miles southeast of York, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern York County. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 359 and 365. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for east central Nebraska.
